trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 1.5 版的簽章。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create a digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來建立數位簽章使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter> to verify digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter>來驗證數位簽章與<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>演算法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立 PKCS #1 1.5 版簽章。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>設定的金鑰和雜湊演算法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的執行個體，具有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>設定雜湊演算法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要簽署的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定資料的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 簽章。

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for <paramref name="rgbHash" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> 的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法之前，您必須指定索引鍵和雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立 PKCS #1 1.5 版簽章。

trans-unit.source: The key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hash algorithm is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbHash" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 要用於建立簽章之雜湊演算法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 設定建立簽章時所要使用的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定雜湊演算法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法的執行個體，具有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Sets the private key to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 設定要用來建立簽章的私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定的索引鍵，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
